title: Fragment, 1830–35
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain compound satin with supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of Harold Norton of the Hayden Company
description: Fragment of a dress silk with an allover design of floral sprays and a lace pattern in blue, green, purple and white. On a black ground.
